column2: JavaScript library for one-directional scrolling with item based navigation support.

column5:
Merge pull request #210 from Download/dev-206

Added a threshold of 3 pixels before initiating drag.

Added a threshold of 3 pixels before initiating drag.
Fixes https://github.com/darsain/sly/issues/206
Global scroll hijack protection should be ignored when document or window is used as a scrollSource.
StyleRestorer should ignore non elements. Fixes #192.
Adding an option to set slidee element manually. Closes #195.
Let events propagate when filtering out interactive elements. Fixed #189.
Actually use the scrollHijack option value.
Don't count scroll events originating inside a Sly frame as global. Fixes #182.
Don't process drag move events when dragging path is 0.
Prev/Next methods should activate 1st item when no item is active.
Make sure dragging is marked as released inside dragEnd(). Fixes #168.
Account for subpixel values when retrieving item size. Fixes #177, closes #150.
Unbind event handlers from document specifically. Fixes #166.
Use binary flags for button state caching.

Merge pull request #167 from dikdiv/patch-1

Button state caching to take into account positions that are both isStart and isEnd.

Merge pull request #176 from ajw625/patch-1

Remove reference to jQuery variable

Remove reference to jQuery

I ran across this when testing this using another component that requires a different version of jQuery.

Update sly.js

Bag. 
When sly is in first position. After adding the items into sly, forward button remains in a disabled state
Make default boolean options boolean, not integers.
Restore all styles on destroy, closes #53

Merge pull request #154 from vaggh/patch-1

Update Markup.md
Prevent native image dragging in Firefox, ref #147
Changing closure-compiler for uglifyjs. Bigger file, but no Java.
Allow event bubbling in dragInit, fixes #147.
Moving changelog and docs to repo.
Fix to activation of requested position when the "startAt" tile is non existent
add() index argument bigger than items.length falls back to default behavior, fixes #141
Implementing wheel event with fallback to mousewheel in IE8-, closes #138
Implementing protection against hijacking global scrolling.
Make sure that disableOneEvent is onbound after dragging
Addressing regression of perpendicular scrolling lock, ref #41
Fixed page generation for item-based navigation, ref #100
Do not initiate dragging or activate items when source element is interactive, ref #27
Fixing page generation edge case in tightly fitted item based navigation, closes #97
Activate item when it was just appended, and is the only item
Simplified calculation of dynamic handle size
Account for border-box sizing when setting limits and resizing slidee
Fixed page generation in item based navigation
Making getPx correctly parse negative values
Account for pos.end when generating pages from items, fixes #97
Iteration on mouse wheel delta normalization, ref #91 #87 #67
Account for subpixel values caused by imprecise units, ref #89
Again decoupling pathToLock between touch & other inputs, and tweaking values
Fixed .remove() not reactivating items in forceCentered navigation, ref #88
Re-center active item in centered navigations when reloading, fixes #88
Overhauled dragging initiation to be more responsive, ref #87
Making .slideBy() to slide by items in item based navigation
Added storage and execution of callbacks from temporary array, fixes #84
Fixing remove() broken by last commits
Fixing duplicate events beign fired, ref #82 #83

Merge pull request #79 from b1nd/master

Update README.md
Fixed mouse wheel scrolling compatibility with jquery.mousewheel plugin
Fixed infinite loop on dragEnd when speed: 0
dragEnd to correctly fire moveEnd event when there is nowhere to move, fixes #70
Check for dragging direction only when dragging SLIDEE
Reverting wheel delta normalization to previous state, ref #57
Adding better wheel delta normalization, ref #57
Fixing parallax mode broken in previous commits
Adding native frame scroll reset, fixes #61
Fixed required styles for translate positioning without GPU acceleration
Fixing handle in forceCentered navigation, closes #66
disableOneEvent to remove the handler from the actual element it was attached to
Don't prevent touchend event on dragging release
Fixed redundant page generation in non-item based navigation
Fixing to() function ignoring immediate argument, closes #46
Implemented direction dependent dragging initiation, ref #41
Fixing handle not moving in IE8 parallax mode, ref #45
Fixing grunt bumping before building shenanigans
Replacing lib name with pck.name variable
Overriding environment based line endings enforced by Grunt
Default options re-arranged and tweaking some comments
Updating build task, and drying up release task
Don't bind handle dragging if there is no handle, fixes #39
Making add and remove methods work in non-item based mode
Fixing redundant  event binding in parallax mode, and re-arranging options
Support for adding multiple items with add method
Simplifying option names from syncFactor, dragReleaseSwing, and swingSyncFactor to syncSpeed, releaseSwing, and swingSpeed
Calling pageBuilder with sly instance as its scope
Fixing startPaused broken by previous commit
Tweaking dragging swing, adding dragging options, and making more options dynamically configurable
Fixing infinite pages generation (euphemism for browser crash) when frameSize equals 0
Reworking continuous movement into one moveBy method
Tweaking pagesbar items generation process, ref #36
Lowering the frequency of change event and render() calls by slideTo to only when necessary
Fixing activatePage ignoring page with index 0
Fixed updateButtonsState() being called too soon
Fixed toEnd & toCenter methods always doing what they are supposed to
Tweaking activatePage method, and fixing activePage event not triggering when it should
Tweaks and cleanups. Adding itemSelector option.
Normalizing frame argument to allow selectors to be passed to it
Moving event handlers into non-anonymous functions
Fixed item click event disabler not unbinding itself in IE8 and lower
Lowering dragging historyTick frequency to once per 10ms
Dragging should pause & unpause with lower priority than pauseOnHover
Abandoning single var statement for better maintanability, readability, and more functional git diffs
Changed soft pause into pause priority
Moving defaults to Sly object and exposing options from Sly instance
Exposing properties, and slight restructuring that comes with it
Renamed cycle method and event names
Fixing borked tweesing animation when 0 speed
Fixed infinite rendering loop caused by immediate animations
Fixing collision between handle and content dragging when dragSource is handle parent element
Adding immediate argument to activate and activatePage methods
Teaching clickBar to play nicely with dragHandle
Fixed fwd/bwd buttons not stopping when mouse moved away before firing mouseup
Improved relative visible items determination process, fixes #33
Do not disable click actions in dragHandler when not dragging SLIDEE
Implemented forward, backward, and stop methods with button aliases
Fixed updateButtonsState function not marking disabled states properly
Fix end limit on forceCentered navigation without items, closes #28
Set correct required styles on init
Fixing getPx misbehaving in IE8, fixes #26
Actually adding support for GPU acceleration with translateZ(0)
Fixed forced cycle resume in smart item based navigations
Do not align in centered navigation when start or end position is requested
Smarter division into pages for item based navigations
Cleaner and compile safe jQuery method proxy arguments handling
Fixed scrollbar handle not synchronizing on reload when SLIDEE position has not changed, but size did
Implementing immediate argument to positioning methods, renamed min/max properties to start/end
Adding item size property to object returned from getPos in non-item based navigation
Adding jquery.json for jQuery plugins register
Extending getPos method, and DRYing up toXxx methods
Fixing event.which inconsistency for right mouse button
Removing no longer necessary minify shell script
Adding grunt build system, and component.json for Bower
Removing no longer necessary header comment
Relaxed min path required for touch dragging initialization, ref #21
Updating infinite scroll example code to use new API
Touch events, tweaking destroy, removeclass optimization, new methods: slideTo, slideBy, getPos, getRel
Setting domEvents to be disabled by default
Making .off() method accept array with callbacks
Implemented callbacks, on & off methods, and some API changes
Updating destroy method, and moving stopDefault out of Plugin scope
Added limits for getRelatives position argument
New animation rendering, requestAnimationFrame support, GPU acceleration, minor rewrite
Fixed move event, added nav event, ref #2
Return an instance only for the first element in set
updated jQuery extension logic, and introduced returnInstance argument
added old property to position object for sly:load event
do not cancel page scroll if there is no sly scrolling to be done
bad item width value for first 2 examples
no need for minified file in development stage
fixed dragging navigation not working in IE8-
